thread.title: Feral cats found tortured and killed on Long Island lawn
thread.title_full: Feral cats found tortured and killed on Long Island lawn - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Feral cats found tortured and killed on Long Island lawn
text:
The Suffolk County Police Department was looking for whoever is responsible for torturing and killing a kitten and adult cat. PATCHOGUE, N.Y. â€” Authorities say a feral kitten and adult cat were tortured, killed and left on a Long Island lawn.
The Suffolk County Police Department was looking Monday for a suspect or suspects, and various agencies were offering rewards for information.
The animals were killed sometime between 11 p.m. Friday and 11 a.m. Saturday.
Police say they were found on the lawn of a person who had been caring for them, on Corbin Ave. in Patchogue.
The Suffolk County Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals says the kitten was 4 to 6 months old, and the animals were tortured.
Authorities believe the felines were attacked by a person or people, not by another animal.
